name: Gray Ooze
movement: slow, 10 ft. walking speed, climbing and swimming at the same speed
description: The Gray Ooze is a formless, slimy creature with a semi-liquid mass that can squeeze through cracks and crevices. It has a corrosive nature, capable of dissolving metal, wood, and organic matter.
memorable: Its corrosive touch damages armor and weapons, and it blends seamlessly with wet stone.
goals: To consume anything it comes into contact with.
relations: May be encountered with other oozes or subterranean creatures.
strengths: Has blindsight up to 60 feet; resistant to various conditions like exhaustion, blinded, and frightened.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on attack rolls when in bright light; slow movement.
attacks: Pseudopod attack dealing both bludgeoning and acid damage, capable of corroding nonmagical metal armor.
most_powerful_ability: Corrosive Body ability which damages and can destroy metal objects upon contact.
senses: It has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
skills: Has a proficiency in Stealth due to its ability to ambush.
additional_information: Can move through openings as narrow as 1 inch due to its Amorphous ability.
Nonmagical weapons made of metal that hit it suffer corrosion and damage penalties.
Blends in seamlessly when motionless, resembling wet stone.
test_queries: slimy creature that hides in dark places
corrosive ooze that attacks with pseudopod
creature that consumes metal and wood
ooze with ability to corrode metal
